%% Diagrama de integração Umbler Talk + Make
flowchart TD
    subgraph "Umbler Talk"
        A[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream] --> B{IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic}
        B -- Sim --> C[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        C --> D[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        D --> E[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        B -- Não --> F[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        F --> G{IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream}
        G -- Financeiro --> H[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        H --> I[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        G -- Técnico --> J[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        J --> K[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    end

    subgraph "Make.com"
        L[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] --> M[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        M --> N[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        N --> O[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    end

    C -. POST com dados do cliente .-> L
    H -. POST com mensagem .-> N
    J -. POST com mensagem .-> N
